content.text: Match ends, Paris Saint Germain 1(5), Chelsea 1(6).
Second Half ends, Paris Saint Germain 1, Chelsea 1.
Attempt saved. Christopher Nkunku (Paris Saint Germain) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Hervin Ongenda.
Attempt missed. Jean-Christophe Bahebeck (Paris Saint Germain) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Adrien Rabiot.
Oscar (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Foul by Adrien Rabiot (Paris Saint Germain).

Substitution, Paris Saint Germain. Youssouf Sabaly replaces Gregory Van der Wiel.

Penalty Shootout ends, Paris Saint Germain 1(5), Chelsea 1(6).
Goal!  Paris Saint Germain 1(5), Chelsea 1(6). Thibaut Courtois (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty saved! Thiago Silva (Paris Saint Germain) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Paris Saint Germain 1(5), Chelsea 1(5). Willian (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Paris Saint Germain 1(5), Chelsea 1(4). Marquinhos (Paris Saint Germain) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Paris Saint Germain 1(4), Chelsea 1(4). Oscar (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Paris Saint Germain 1(4), Chelsea 1(3). Edinson Cavani (Paris Saint Germain) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  Paris Saint Germain 1(3), Chelsea 1(3). Loïc Remy (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty saved! Jean-Christophe Bahebeck (Paris Saint Germain) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the centre of the goal.

Goal!  Paris Saint Germain 1(3), Chelsea 1(2). Hervin Ongenda (Paris Saint Germain) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
